title: Senator Jeff Flick: Solar power can't work with energy lights at night?
subtitle: Comment made by Senator Arizona Jeff Flick during a meeting in the municipal hall that was reproduced without context to make him appear ignorant of the basics of solar energy.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: In the Arizona City Hall event, Jeff Flick said to the voters, "We can't rely on solar energy because we can't tell people they won't have lights during the night."
